Texts.Chs:
你想部署你自己的空间站吗？我可以为你制造你自己的^orange;空间站应答器^white;，所需要的只一点资源！
只要拿^green;1个^orange;能量核心^white;、^green;12个^orange;铜线^white;和以及^green;6个^orange;碳板^green;给我或者其他应答器供应商^white;就行了！记得你还需支付^green;6000点^orange;像素^green;
Texts.Eng:
If you'd like your own Space Station I can build you a ^orange;Station Transponder^reset; if you provide the materials to construct it. 
 I need ^green;1 ^orange;Power Core^reset;, ^green;12 ^orange;Copper Wire^reset;, and ^green;6 ^orange;Carbon Plate^reset; to ^green;me or any other Transponder vendor^reset;. Note that you'll also be charged a ^green;6000^reset; pixel fee for labor.
